name: Chapter 1: The Awakening
description: Begin your journey in the world of Hytale.

chapters.name: The First Steps
chapters.description: Master the fundamentals of survival in Orbis. This section teaches you essential mechanics: gathering resources, combat basics, inventory management, and exploration. Complete these objectives to progress through Zone 1.

objectives.description: Check your profile with /profile to see your stats, level, and equipment
View your inventory with /inventory to see your items and manage your gear
Gather 5 Ancient Bark by using /gather foraging in the Emerald Grove biome
Check your exploration status with /explore status to see your current biome
Defeat a Feral Trork using /hunt to learn combat mechanics
Visit the shop with /shop to see available items and learn about the economy
Check the travel menu with /travel status to see neighboring biomes

chapters.name: The Emerald Grove
chapters.description: Dive deeper into Zone 1 by exploring the Emerald Grove biome thoroughly. Learn about quests, base claiming, settlements, and advanced exploration mechanics. This section ensures you experience all major Zone 1 features before moving forward.

objectives.description: Perform 3 exploration actions (forage, mine, or scavenge) in the Emerald Grove using /explore
Complete 2 quests using /quests to view available quests and /completequest to finish them
Check base information with /base list to learn about claiming bases in biomes
Gather 10 Ancient Bark total to stockpile resources for crafting and trading
Defeat 3 Feral Trorks to gain combat experience and loot
Browse the codex with /codex to discover information about items and enemies you've found

chapters.name: Zone 1 Complete
chapters.description: Complete your journey through Zone 1 and unlock access to Zone 2: Howling Sands.

objectives.description: Reach level 15
Complete 3 dungeons

name: Chapter 2: The Howling Sands
description: Journey into the vast desert of Zone 2, where ancient secrets and powerful magic await. Master the harsh environment, discover lost temples, and unlock your true potential through the Class System.

chapters.name: The Desert Crossing
chapters.description: Your first steps into Zone 2: Howling Sands. The scorching sun and shifting dunes test your resolve. Learn to survive in this harsh environment, gather desert resources, and discover the first signs of ancient civilizations.

objectives.description: Perform 5 exploration actions in the Howling Sands biome to adapt to the desert environment
Gather 10 Desert Crystals by mining in desert biomes - these rare materials are essential for Zone 2 crafting
Defeat 5 Sand Scorpions to prove your combat prowess in the desert
Use /travel to explore neighboring biomes in Zone 2 and discover new areas
Complete 2 Zone 2 dungeons to gain experience with the increased difficulty

chapters.name: The Wind Temple
chapters.description: Rumors speak of an ancient Wind Temple hidden in the deepest dunes. Seek out this legendary structure, solve its mysteries, and uncover the first clues about the Class System - a path to unlocking your true potential.

objectives.description: Discover the Wind Temple biome through exploration - this rare location holds ancient secrets
Defeat 3 Temple Guardians protecting the Wind Temple - these powerful enemies guard ancient knowledge
Complete 3 Zone 2 quests to gain favor with the desert factions and learn about the region's history
Use /codex to research the ancient texts you've discovered, learning about the Class System

chapters.name: The Path of Mastery
chapters.description: Having proven yourself in the Howling Sands, you discover the ancient Class Sanctum - a rare structure where adventurers can choose their path. Warrior, Mage, or Rogue - each class offers unique abilities and skill trees. This choice will shape your journey forward.

objectives.description: Reach level 20 - you must be strong enough to handle the power of a class
Discover the Oasis Springs biome - the Class Sanctum is rumored to appear near these sacred waters
Defeat a Desert Wraith - these powerful entities guard the path to the Class Sanctum
Visit the Class Sanctum and choose your class using /chooseclass <warrior|mage|rogue> - this is a permanent choice that unlocks your skill tree

chapters.name: Zone 2 Complete - Master of the Sands
chapters.description: You have mastered the Howling Sands, discovered the Class System, and chosen your path. The desert has tested you, and you have emerged stronger. Your journey continues, but now with the power of a true class at your side.

objectives.description: Reach level 25 to prove your mastery of Zone 2
Learn at least 3 skills in your chosen class to begin mastering your path
Complete 5 Zone 2 dungeons to demonstrate your combat prowess
